meanings.definition: A place where cream is made into butter and cheese.
meanings.sent1: The creameries in the village produce delicious butter.
meanings.sent2: We visited the creameries to see how cheese is made.
meanings.sent3: The creameries were so busy that the cows had to wait in line to be milked.
meanings.sent4: The creameries were like magical factories turning cream into golden butter.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh butter filled the air around the creameries.

meanings.definition: A business that produces and sells cream-based products.
meanings.sent1: The local creameries supply our favorite ice cream flavors.
meanings.sent2: I always buy my milk from the creameries down the road.
meanings.sent3: The creameries had a sale on whipped cream, so I stocked up.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as the treats from the creameries.
meanings.sent5: The creameries' logo was a happy cow surrounded by creamy swirls.
